${modID}:AncientIncenseBurner.NAME: Ancient Incense Burner
${modID}:AncientIncenseBurner.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: An incense burner used to communicate with the ancestral spirits within Quintessences.

${modID}:AbandonedWeddingRing.NAME: Abandoned Wedding Ring
${modID}:AbandonedWeddingRing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: How long has it been left out? This ring is cold.

${modID}:BoneOfTime.NAME: Bone of Time
${modID}:BoneOfTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: A grotesque hourglass containing finely ground bone dust.

${modID}:HateStone.NAME: Hate Stone
${modID}:HateStone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: A stone the orc shamans imbued with black magic to enhance combativeness.

${modID}:BrokenDagger.NAME: Broken Dagger
${modID}:BrokenDagger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Nobody knows why, but it looks more threatening when broken.

${modID}:CarleonArmor.NAME: Standard Carleon Armor
${modID}:CarleonArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Non-distinct, standard-issue armor worn by the Carleon Army.

${modID}:HandOfGlory.NAME: Hand of Glory
${modID}:HandOfGlory.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The owner of this enormous hand would grow more powerful with size.

${modID}:FrostWitchStaff.NAME: Frost Witch's Staff
${modID}:FrostWitchStaff.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The crazy witch would summon multiple hailstorms in a single day.

${modID}:TerribleBladeShards.NAME: Terrible Blade Shards
${modID}:TerribleBladeShards.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Terrible shards which inflict cuts that never heal.

${modID}:ManaGauntlets.NAME: Mana Gauntlets
${modID}:ManaGauntlets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: A set of magical tools that allows the wearer to draw mana from his body to his hands.

${modID}:GoldenWhip.NAME: Golden Whip
${modID}:GoldenWhip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Hurry up and hit me! Please! Please! I beg you!

${modID}:SphinxEye.NAME: Sphinx Eye
${modID}:SphinxEye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: An eye believed to make its bearer fearless.

${modID}:FrostGiantLeather.NAME: Frost Giant's Leather
${modID}:FrostGiantLeather.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The leather of a giant who once inhabited cold regions. The cold would provide him peace of mind.

${modID}:StoneMask.NAME: Stone Mask
${modID}:StoneMask.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: I forfeit my humanity! I will transcend it!

${modID}:NaiasHeart.NAME: Naias's Heart
${modID}:NaiasHeart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: A magic gem found in the place of the heart of the spirit who protected Elemental Lake.

${modID}:BoneOfMadness.NAME: Bone of Madness
${modID}:BoneOfMadness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Bones made by countless, compressed bones. They say the array of these bones are such a sight to behold.

${modID}:GrudgeStone.NAME: Grudge Stone
${modID}:GrudgeStone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This Grudge Stone absorbs negative emotional energy. When it's full, it resonates mana.

${modID}:VampireFang.NAME: Vampire Fang
${modID}:VampireFang.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Elizabeth's fang can't be destroyed by anything under the sun.

${modID}:KnightDetermination.NAME: Knight's Determination
${modID}:KnightDetermination.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: A helm worn by a nameless knight who was found dead in a destroyed palace with his shield still held upward.

${modID}:DecayedHeart.NAME: Decayed Heart
${modID}:DecayedHeart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: A vile heart that discharges poison on impact.

${modID}:ChosenCirclet.NAME: Chosen Hero's Circlet
${modID}:ChosenCirclet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: I shall show you the powers of a true hero!

${modID}:ChosenArrow.NAME: Chosen Hunter's Arrow
${modID}:ChosenArrow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You're the perfect size to take an arrow.

${modID}:ChosenBadge.NAME: Chosen Mage's Badge
${modID}:ChosenBadge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: I shall burn you to ash!

${modID}:ChosenSwords.NAME: Chosen Thief's Twin Swords
${modID}:ChosenSwords.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This skill is too much for you.

${modID}:ChosenArmor.NAME: Chosen Warrior's Armor
${modID}:ChosenArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Hahahaha! Hit me here and there! Not a scratch!

${modID}:WorldTreeSeed.NAME: World Tree Seed
${modID}:WorldTreeSeed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Nature itself that laid the foundation of the forest.

${modID}:PotOfGreed.NAME: Pot of Greed
${modID}:PotOfGreed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The original owner must've been terrible. it's full of greed.

${modID}:GlacierBreaker.NAME: Glacier Breaker
${modID}:GlacierBreaker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: I! Hate! Ice! Break! Them! All!

${modID}:InfiniteBone.NAME: Infinite Bone
${modID}:InfiniteBone.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This is the perfect container for the valuable scrolls from the witch.

${modID}:Demonomicon.NAME: Demonomicon
${modID}:Demonomicon.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The ultimate spell book that shook the continent with heinous destructive power.

${modID}:MiracleGrail.NAME: Miracle Grail
${modID}:MiracleGrail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: It's incredible. Look at the red water keep filling up.

${modID}:ArmorOfFear.NAME: Armor of Fear
${modID}:ArmorOfFear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fear is the root of all superstitions, and one of the roots of cruelty.

${modID}:AsceticHeart.NAME: Heart of the Ascetic
${modID}:AsceticHeart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This explains why he charges at me every time he sees me!

${modID}:IrresistibleSuggestion.NAME: Irresistible Suggestion
${modID}:IrresistibleSuggestion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Its bearer will become the most powerful being in the land. But... they shall be cursed with eternal sadness.

${modID}:TheOneRing.NAME: The Ring
${modID}:TheOneRing.DESCRIPTION: ${modID}:Item: Counts as 1 of ALL sets, including ${modID}:Omen.
${modID}:TheOneRing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: One Ring to rule them all.

${modID}:PropheciesOfEvilLust.NAME: Prophecy of Evil: Lust
${modID}:PropheciesOfEvilLust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Why do you hesitate? Never stop showing off your skills! Each time you defeat an enemy with your skills, you will go beyond your limits!

${modID}:GrimReaperSkull.NAME: Grim Reaper
${modID}:GrimReaperSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: !${modID}:SOUL! ${modID}:Souls. At the start of your turn, gain Temporary HP equal to 8% of your missing HP. NL *Bonepile: Gain ${modID}:Embrace. NL *Swap: ALL dead allies gain your ${modID}:Shroud.
${modID}:GrimReaperSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: He'll make sure you get to the top of the spire, but you'd better have the coin to pay or he'll make you take the boat.

${modID}:LivingArmorSkull.NAME: Living Armor
${modID}:LivingArmorSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: Halve your *Attack damage, but gain that many ${modID}:Flame_Spirits. NL *Bonepile: ALL players gain 2 *Flame *Spirits. NL *Swap: Gain 15 *Flame *Spirits.
${modID}:LivingArmorSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Nobody knows how many degrees it is, but it's a safe bet that this knife is hot enough for you.

${modID}:UnknownKingSkull.NAME: The Unknown King
${modID}:UnknownKingSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: Gain ${modID}:Mana when players draw. NL *Bonepile: Shuffle *Arthurian *Light into an ally's draw pile. NL *Swap: Add *Vivian to your hand.
${modID}:UnknownKingSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: He did NOT die when he was killed, no matter what you may have been told.

${modID}:MinotaurusSkull.NAME: Minotaurus
${modID}:MinotaurusSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: ALL allies take half of your *Attack damage to give you that much skulmod:Stamina. ALL allies gain half of your unblocked damage taken as *Stamina.
${modID}:MinotaurusSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Just because he's not TRYING to kill you doesn't mean the backswing won't do the job by mistake. You'll be a little sturdier after if you make it through though!

${modID}:HeroSkull.NAME: Hero
${modID}:HeroSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: The first *Swap generates a *Heroic *Entrance. NL *Bonepile: ALL allies *Bonepile. NL *Swap: ALL allies *Swap.
${modID}:HeroSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The apple never fell far from the tree.

${modID}:CarleonRecruitSkull.NAME: Carleon Recruit
${modID}:CarleonRecruitSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: Take 1 less damage for each ${modID}:Veteran you have. NL *Bonepile: Gain a ${modID}:Rank. NL *Swap: ALL players gain 4 *Ranks.
${modID}:CarleonRecruitSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Fall in line! He might look weak, but this is Sir General Comodore Fifteenth Legion Admiral Colonel Duke Skelington The Fourth!

${modID}:AlchemistSkull.NAME: Alchemist
${modID}:AlchemistSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: Deal 1 extra damage for each debuff on a target or potion used this turn. NL *Bonepile: ${modID}:Concoct. NL *Swap: *Concoct 2 and gain a random ${modID}:Flask.
${modID}:AlchemistSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: He's got a good throwing arm, so you'll test the potion whether or not you want to. If you're agreeable, you might get some cool new limbs instead of losing your head...

${modID}:GraveDiggerSkull.NAME: Grave Digger
${modID}:GraveDiggerSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: When an enemy dies, add a *Burial to your hand. NL *Bonepile: Gain 1 ${modID}:Lament. NL *Swap: Add a *Burial to your hand
${modID}:GraveDiggerSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: He doesn't understand what's so sad - it's all so very funny, isn't it? Maybe he's just post-humorous.

${modID}:ArthurianLight.NAME: Arthurian Light
${modID}:ArthurianLight.DESCRIPTION: Target ally draws !M! card. NL Target an enemy to use on yourself. NL Purge.
${modID}:ArthurianLight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target ally draws !M! cards. NL Target an enemy to use on yourself. NL Purge.

${modID}:Vivian.NAME: Vivian
${modID}:Vivian.DESCRIPTION: Target ally draws until their hand is full, then discards half their hand.  NL Target an enemy to use on yourself. NL Purge.
${modID}:Vivian.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target ally draws until their hand is full, then discards half their hand.  NL Target an enemy to use on yourself. NL Purge.

${modID}:Excalibur.NAME: Excalibur
${modID}:Excalibur.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage, equal to the number of cards ALL players drew in total this turn. NL Purge.
${modID}:Excalibur.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage, equal to the number of cards ALL players drew in total this turn. NL Purge.

${modID}:GravePhantom.NAME: Grave Phantom
${modID}:GravePhantom.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL ALL players gain Block equal to your missing HP.
${modID}:GravePhantom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL ALL players gain Block equal to your missing HP.

${modID}:ReapingStrike.NAME: Reaping Strike
${modID}:ReapingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each ${modID}:Fading ally, deal damage again.
${modID}:ReapingStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL For each ${modID}:Fading ally, deal damage again.

${modID}:Guillotine.NAME: Guillotine
${modID}:Guillotine.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL You and the target take !D! damage. Put this in a random ally's hand with damage equal to double the damage dealt.
${modID}:Guillotine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL You and the target lose !D! HP. Put this in a random ally's hand with damage equal to double the damage dealt.

${modID}:NetherworldFissure.NAME: Netherworld Fissure
${modID}:NetherworldFissure.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Gateway to your hand, and to the hand of any ${modID}:Fading ally.
${modID}:NetherworldFissure.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Upgraded *Gateway to your hand, and to the hand of any ${modID}:Fading ally.

${modID}:Gateway.NAME: Gateway
${modID}:Gateway.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy, then your target. NL Purge.
${modID}:Gateway.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy, then your target. NL Purge.

${modID}:Harvest.NAME: Harvest
${modID}:Harvest.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target is an ally, heal equal to the unblocked damage and give them twice as much Block. If they're ${modID}:Fading, gain full effect.
${modID}:Harvest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target is an ally, heal equal to the unblocked damage and give them twice as much Block. If they're ${modID}:Fading, gain full effect.

${modID}:Sentence.NAME: Sentence
${modID}:Sentence.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL If the target is an ally, they gain [E] and ${modID}:Corpse_Explosion.
${modID}:Sentence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable. NL If the target is an ally, they gain [E] [E] and ${modID}:Corpse_Explosion.

${modID}:Backdraft.NAME: Backdraft
${modID}:Backdraft.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain that many ${modID}:Flame_Spirits.
${modID}:Backdraft.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain that many ${modID}:Flame_Spirits.

${modID}:SoulArmor.NAME: Soul Armor
${modID}:SoulArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain 8 *Flame *Spirits. NL Block the next !M! attacks with up to that many ${modID}:Flame_Spirits. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SoulArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain 8 *Flame *Spirits. NL Block the next !M! attacks with up to that many ${modID}:Flame_Spirits. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ToolsOfValor.NAME: Tools of Valor
${modID}:ToolsOfValor.DESCRIPTION: Target ally gains !B! Block and !M! ${modID}:Flame_Spirits. NL Target an enemy to use on yourself.
${modID}:ToolsOfValor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target ally gains !B! Block and !M! ${modID}:Flame_Spirits. NL Target an enemy to use on yourself.

${modID}:SoulSpark.NAME: Soul Spark
${modID}:SoulSpark.DESCRIPTION: ALL players gain 10 ${modID}:Flame_Spirits. NL ALL enemies gain !M! skulmod:Burn and Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:SoulSpark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL players gain 10 ${modID}:Flame_Spirits. NL ALL enemies gain !M! skulmod:Burn and Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:StokeTheFlames.NAME: Stoke The Flames
${modID}:StokeTheFlames.DESCRIPTION: Target ally enters ${modID}:Combustion. Target an enemy to use on yourself. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:StokeTheFlames.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target ally enters ${modID}:Combustion. Target an enemy to use on yourself. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Kiln.NAME: Kiln
${modID}:Kiln.DESCRIPTION: If ANY player is in ${modID}:Combustion, ALL of them enter *Combustion. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Kiln.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If ANY player is in ${modID}:Combustion, ALL of them enter *Combustion. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:SecondWind.NAME: Grudge Match
${modID}:SecondWind.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ALL players enter Calm. NL At the start of the next turn, ALL players enter Wrath.
${modID}:SecondWind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL ALL players enter Calm. NL At the start of the next turn, ALL players enter Wrath.

${modID}:JollyRoger.NAME: Jolly Roger
${modID}:JollyRoger.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Choose !M! card in your hand. Add a copy of it to ALL allies' hands.
${modID}:JollyRoger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! card in your hand. Add a copy of it to ALL allies' hands.

${modID}:FullHouse.NAME: Full House
${modID}:FullHouse.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you skulmod:Gamble, allies also skulmod:Gamble !M! times.
${modID}:FullHouse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you skulmod:Gamble, allies also skulmod:Gamble !M! times.

${modID}:KnifeTrick.NAME: Knife Trick
${modID}:KnifeTrick.DESCRIPTION: Add an exact copy of the next !M! card an ally plays to your DECK. NL Fleeting.
${modID}:KnifeTrick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an exact copy of the next !M! cards an ally plays to your DECK. NL Fleeting.

${modID}:ColdSnap.NAME: Cold Snap
${modID}:ColdSnap.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Exhaust. NL ALL players become skulmod:Frozen !M!.
${modID}:ColdSnap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. Exhaust. NL ALL players become skulmod:Frozen !M!.

${modID}:Incantation.NAME: Ritual
${modID}:Incantation.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Rapid *Channel to ALL allies' hands.
${modID}:Incantation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Upgraded *Rapid *Channel to ALL allies' hands.

${modID}:FiringSquad.NAME: Firing Squad
${modID}:FiringSquad.DESCRIPTION: ALL players gain !M! Temporary Focus and Channel an skulmod:Arrow.
${modID}:FiringSquad.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL players gain !M! Temporary Focus and Channel an skulmod:Arrow.

${modID}:Fence.NAME: Fence
${modID}:Fence.DESCRIPTION: Each ally that can afford to pays you !M! *Gold to draw a card.
${modID}:Fence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each ally that can afford to pays you !M! *Gold to draw 2 cards.

${modID}:Phalanx.NAME: Phalanx
${modID}:Phalanx.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL ALL players' gain half of the highest Block among you.
${modID}:Phalanx.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL ALL players' gain half of the highest Block among you. If it was your Block, gain [E] .

${modID}:CompoundStrike.NAME: Compound Strike
${modID}:CompoundStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ALL allies' Strength and Vigor increase the damage.
${modID}:CompoundStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL ALL allies' Strength and Vigor increase the damage.

${modID}:PackMentality.NAME: Pack Mentality
${modID}:PackMentality.DESCRIPTION: When you discard a card, a random ally draws !M! card.
${modID}:PackMentality.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When you discard a card, a random ally draws !M! card.

${modID}:Survivor.NAME: Survivor
${modID}:Survivor.DESCRIPTION: Each ally gains !M! Block at the start of the turn. For each dead ally, you gain [E] and draw a card instead.
${modID}:Survivor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Each ally gains !M! Block at the start of the turn. For each dead ally, you gain [E] and draw a card instead.

${modID}:Gymnasium.NAME: Gymnasium
${modID}:Gymnasium.DESCRIPTION: Add a skulmod:Grapple to your hand. NL Add a copy of the next !M! *Grapples you play to a random ally's hand.
${modID}:Gymnasium.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a skulmod:Grapple to your hand. NL Add a copy of the next !M! *Grapples you play to a random ally's hand.

${modID}:ThreeKingdoms.NAME: Three Kingdoms
${modID}:ThreeKingdoms.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Strategy *Book to ALL allies' hands. NL Draw !M! card.
${modID}:ThreeKingdoms.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add an Upgraded *Strategy *Book to ALL allies' hands. NL Draw !M! cards.

${modID}:Coopacalypse.NAME: Co-opacalypse
${modID}:Coopacalypse.DESCRIPTION: Target ally gains !M! Focus and channels a ${modID}:Meteor.
${modID}:Coopacalypse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Target ally gains !M! Focus and channels a ${modID}:Meteor.

${modID}:Soulburn.NAME: Soulburn
${modID}:Soulburn.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, ALL characters gain skulmod:Burn.
${modID}:Soulburn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When drawn, ALL characters gain !M! skulmod:Burn.

${modID}:HeroicEntrance.NAME: Heroic Entrance
${modID}:HeroicEntrance.DESCRIPTION: *Swap. NL As *Hero, ALL players skulmod:Bonepile !M! and skulmod:Swap instead.
${modID}:HeroicEntrance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Swap. NL As *Hero, ALL players skulmod:Bonepile !M! and skulmod:Swap instead.

${modID}:ComradeSystem.NAME: Comrade System
${modID}:ComradeSystem.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Either choose a ${modID}:Comrade to Channel, or ${modID}:Order !M! time.
${modID}:ComradeSystem.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Either choose a ${modID}:Veteran ${modID}:Comrade to Channel, or ${modID}:Order !M! times.

${modID}:ScoutArcher.NAME: Scout Archer
${modID}:ScoutArcher.DESCRIPTION: Scout an *Archer ${modID}:Comrade that spreads Vigor to ALL players.
${modID}:ScoutArcher.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scout a ${modID}:Veteran *Archer ${modID}:Comrade that spreads Vigor to ALL players.

${modID}:ScoutAssassin.NAME: Scout Assassin
${modID}:ScoutAssassin.DESCRIPTION: Scout an *Assassin ${modID}:Comrade that causes ALL players to deal damage.
${modID}:ScoutAssassin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scout a ${modID}:Veteran *Assassin ${modID}:Comrade that causes ALL players to deal damage.

${modID}:ScoutKnight.NAME: Scout Knight
${modID}:ScoutKnight.DESCRIPTION: Scout a *Knight ${modID}:Comrade that spreads Block to ALL players.
${modID}:ScoutKnight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scout a ${modID}:Veteran *Knight ${modID}:Comrade that spreads Block to ALL players.

${modID}:ScoutRecruit.NAME: Scout Recruit
${modID}:ScoutRecruit.DESCRIPTION: Scout a *Recruit ${modID}:Comrade that will leave to carry an *Order to other players.
${modID}:ScoutRecruit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scout a ${modID}:Veteran *Recruit ${modID}:Comrade that will leave to carry an *Order to other players.

${modID}:CommanderForm.NAME: Commander Form
${modID}:CommanderForm.DESCRIPTION: Former ${modID}:Comrades will be ${modID}:Ordered at a value of !M! even after being Evoked. *Recruits and other orbs will give ${modID}:Ranks.
${modID}:CommanderForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Former ${modID}:Comrades will be ${modID}:Ordered at a value of !M! even after being Evoked. *Recruits and other orbs will give ${modID}:Ranks.

${modID}:Experimentation.NAME: Experimentation
${modID}:Experimentation.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Give target ally a random ${modID}:Flask. Target an enemy to use on yourself.
${modID}:Experimentation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Give target ally a random ${modID}:Flask. Target an enemy to use on yourself.

${modID}:Burial.NAME: Burial
${modID}:Burial.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Create a ${modID}:Grave. Target a *Grave to choose a ${modID}:Great_Tragedy to channel.
${modID}:Burial.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Create a ${modID}:Grave. Target a *Grave to gain an orb slot and choose a ${modID}:Great_Tragedy to channel.

${modID}:Hamlet.NAME: Hamlet
${modID}:Hamlet.DESCRIPTION: *Hamlet deals damage to a random enemy every turn, prioritizing ${modID}:Graves and lasting 2 turns.
${modID}:Hamlet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Hamlet deals damage to a random enemy every turn, prioritizing ${modID}:Graves and lasting 2 turns.

${modID}:Othello.NAME: Othello
${modID}:Othello.DESCRIPTION: *Othello deals damage to a random enemy when Evoked, lasting 1 turn. The longer he survives, the more damage he deals.
${modID}:Othello.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Othello deals damage to a random enemy when Evoked, lasting 1 turn. The longer he survives, the more damage he deals.

${modID}:Macbeth.NAME: Macbeth
${modID}:Macbeth.DESCRIPTION: *Macbeth deals damage to ALL enemies when Evoked, lasting 5 turns.
${modID}:Macbeth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Macbeth deals damage to ALL enemies when Evoked, lasting 5 turns.

${modID}:KingLear.NAME: King Lear
${modID}:KingLear.DESCRIPTION: *King *Lear grants Vigor every turn, lasting 2 turns.
${modID}:KingLear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *King *Lear grants Vigor every turn, lasting 2 turns.

${modID}:Presto.NAME: Presto!
${modID}:Presto.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Channel a ${modID}:Genie using up to !M! of your HP. NL Fails if your HP is at 1. NL Purge.
${modID}:Presto.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Channel a ${modID}:Genie using up to !M! of your HP. NL Fails if your HP is at 1. NL Purge.

${modID}:GeneSkull.NAME: Gene
${modID}:GeneSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: If a ${modID}:Genie takes half or more of a hit's damage, prevent all damage that exceeds its HP. NL *Swap: Add a *Presto! to your hand.
${modID}:GeneSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: He excels at making things disappear. Unfortunately, everything but him seems to struggle to re-appear.

${modID}:SamuraiSkull.NAME: Samurai
${modID}:SamuraiSkull.DESCRIPTION: *Passive: Deal up to 2x damage to the ${modID}:Shogun, the more HP they have left. NL *Bonepile: *Mark the ${modID}:Shogun. NL *Swap: Put *Full *Moon *Slash on top of your deck.
${modID}:SamuraiSkull.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: He's dedicated life to becoming the most feared samurai to ever exist - and this time tripping onto his own sword won't stop his plans.

${modID}:FullMoonSlash.NAME: Full Moon Slash
${modID}:FullMoonSlash.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage, equal to the enemy's *Mark times the number of players. NL Purge.
${modID}:FullMoonSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage, equal to the enemy's *Mark times the number of players. NL Purge.

${modID}:SoulContract.NAME: Soul Contract
${modID}:SoulContract.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Convert !M! *Max *HP into ${modID}:Souls for the target, or Strength instead if you have 1 *Max *HP. NL Purge.
${modID}:SoulContract.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Convert !M! *Max *HP into ${modID}:Souls and Strength for the target, or only Strength if you have 1 *Max *HP. NL Purge.
